input_text:
Job Title: Senior Engineering Manager

Location: Detroit, MI

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
We’re looking for a full-time Senior Engineering Manager to join our office in Detroit, who is enthusiastic about building engineering and will play a critical role in onboarding buildings into our smart building platform. Our mission is to give our clients the best experience possible, every day. To do that, we depend on our team of talented, ambitious people who share our passion for excellence. 
WHAT YOU WILL DO:  Manage staff and assign tasks to senior engineering and technical personnel where requests may be coming from various internal & external sourcesOversee team logistics and resource allocationBalance day-to-day direction of the engineering team vs. R&D opportunities to further the KODE product / solutionEnsure timely and high quality delivery of outcomes from dedicated engineering teamDocument common practices and find areas of efficiencies to continuously improve team performanceDirectly contribute to team tasks w/hands-on engineering work Communicate technical information to non-technical stakeholders as team representative Work directly with Mission Control team lead to ensure special projects can be accomplished / enabled and to set team direction
REQUIREMENTS: Professional experience with personnel and project management skills Expert-level knowledge of smart building industryExperience working with building management systems and commercial level HVAC controlsExpert-level knowledge of real estate market and construction processesProfessional experience with direct client interaction and communication to ensure successful product deliveryAbility to handle multiple projects from concept through execution, meeting deadlines without sacrificing qualityExcellent multitasking, attention to detail and organizational skillsExpert-level ability to document and create scalable processes
GOOD TO HAVE:Experience working with building management systems and commercial level HVAC controlsNiagara / BMS Certifications is a plusKnowledge of and experience with industry communication protocols (BACnet, Modbus, LON)Knowledge of IT network infrastructure practices 
WHAT WE OFFER: Competitive salary based on experience Discretionary Bonus Program Comprehensive Health Insurance PackageCareer Development Program Dynamic team and challenging projects Flexible Paid Time Off Welcoming and friendly work environment Regular social events and activities 
JOIN THE TEAM: 
KODE Labs is a real estate technology company founded in 2017 with a mission to change the way people, buildings and systems operate. Headquartered in Detroit, Michigan, we are a driving force behind the adoption of smart building technology. To scale our presence across numerous cities and countries, we depend on our team of talented, ambitious people who go above and beyond to create value for our clients. 
When you join the KODE Labs team you can create your own career. Whether you have years of experience or are just starting, we help you realize your full potential and achieve your goals. ﻿If KODE Labs sounds like the place for you, we’d love to hear your story, so please apply through our online application form. Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.

Experience Level (if available): None
